sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Populate newly added wsd_table and wsd_field column in sn_wsd_indoor_map_place_properties_mapping table</description> <name>Populate Properties Mapping Table</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[ gs.info("[sn_wsd_indoor_map] : Started populated wsd_table and wsd_field in sn_wsd_indoor_map_place_properties_mapping table") var propertiesMappingGr = new GlideRecord("sn_wsd_indoor_map_place_properties_mapping"); propertiesMappingGr.query();
while(propertiesMappingGr.next()) { propertiesMappingGr.setValue('wsd_table', "sn_wsd_core_room"); propertiesMappingGr.setValue('wsd_field', propertiesMappingGr.getValue('wsd_space_column')); propertiesMappingGr.update(); } gs.info("[sn_wsd_indoor_map] : Finished populated wsd_table and wsd_field in sn_wsd_indoor_map_place_properties_mapping table")]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-09-05 12:20:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>532a9a9a77053110e87ced3e9f5a9987</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Populate Properties Mapping Table</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">b208b02253201080b10bfdeeff7c1281</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">b208b02253201080b10bfdeeff7c1281</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_532a9a9a77053110e87ced3e9f5a9987</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-09-05 12:32:50</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
